McClean Avenue, south side, between Malory Avenue and Mamport Boulevard. MIr. P. L. Sperr states that the house is commonly hreputed to date to colonial days, but was probably erected by R.W. Camer91, on whose estate it was then located. The view is eastward, McClean Avenue being cirectly to the left of the house.
About 1924
P. L. Sperr
729139f-a.folder: McClean Avenue & Malory Avenue, Staten Island, NY
